JOIN_US_FOR_THE_SPOOKY: Join us for the Spooky AI Creations Hackathon with Miguel Ángel Durán!
ABOUT_SPOKE: From October 8 to 22, Miguel, a frontend developer and content creator from Spain, is back with his passionate community to unleash creativity and innovation using Cloudinary. Tons of prizes await! If you participated in our last hackathon, you already know what to expect
